entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Toronto
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:52 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Toronto Pearson Int'l Airport 10:02 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -0.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.6 kPa falling
Visibility: 2.8 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -4.2°C
Wind: E 23 km/h gust 38 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning this morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 09:42 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending late this evening then cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 09:42 AM EST Friday 10 March 2023
